A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars Episode 8 quick review:\nIt was a great showing of the over-engineered-for-first-theater-viewing mechanics developed and implemented by Disney. Focus groups\, sample audiences and test-showings be damned; There was a lot wrong with it after a second viewing and deeper scrutiny. Casual viewers go see it at least once. It's great for that. Star Wars fans... don't see it twice. It won't stand the test of time as Episodes 3-7 (and Rogue One) have/will.
